title: Silver and up Ranked 5s
body:
Hi guys me and a mate of mine really wanna play some more ranked 5s so were looking for some people to join us
feel free to add me in game or reply here
i play any role so im not fussed but my mate is a mid/jg main so were looking for adc top jg or supports
we use skype to communicate in game. 
please only silver or higher 

and please when your reply can u have a small champ pool you like to play also in the reply 

thanks guys look forward to hear from u all

replies.body: I'm gold 3 and i can play support (preferably Braum), top (Preferably Malphite), and jungle (I can play whoever fits)
Adc main I can my mains are Draven, Jinx, and vayne to some extent, i am also currently S4
I can play top adc and mid well currently s5 and have been trolled last 10 games really sick of this bs keen if u r
